description:
Kaili was the winner of the Marine Athletics Race in Lilycove City in the Hoenn region. He is also former classmates with Chrysa and she was able to setup a meeting with Chloe so they could learn more about his Vaporeon.
As a professional surfer, Kaili would always take his Eevee with him to both training sessions and competitions. Kaili`s Eevee loved the sea, so it occurred to Kaili one day that he should try surfing with Eevee on the board and he gave it a Water Stone to evolve it.
name: Kairi
